headline: A Look at PNC (PNC) Valuation as It Launches Direct Spot Bitcoin Trading for Private Bank Clients
summary: PNC Financial Services Group (PNC) just became the first major U.S. bank to let eligible private bank clients trade spot bitcoin directly inside its own platform, a meaningful expansion of its digital asset toolbox. See our latest analysis for PNC Financial Services Group. The move into direct bitcoin trading lands at a time when momentum is quietly building, with an 11.82 percent 1 month share price return and a robust 56.14 percent 3 year total shareholder return that together underscore...
